message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $180 for it. It's a very high-quality product.
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $150.
